hasId

public TaskAssert hasId(java.lang.String id)
Assertion on the id of the element in the process definition BPMN 2.0 XML file. Please note that the method Task.getId() returns the database id of the task and not the value of the attribute 'id' of the task in the process definition file.

Parameters:
id - the task id
Returns:
a TaskAssert that can be further configured before starting the process instance
